name: genesis_nullmodel_v1.4.1
title: genesis_nullmodel_v1.4.1
summary: Runs the null model for use in the genesis app

inputSpec.name: outcome_name
inputSpec.label: outcome
inputSpec.help: Column name of the outcome variable in the phenotype file

inputSpec.name: covariate_list
inputSpec.label: Covariates
inputSpec.help: Comma separated list that match column names in the phenotype file. Leave blank for no adjustments

inputSpec.name: outputfilename
inputSpec.label: prefix for output file name, no spaces

inputSpec.name: kinshipmatrix
inputSpec.label: Kinship matrix with sample ids as the row and column names. Rda files should contain a single numeric matrix object.

inputSpec.name: genotypefile
inputSpec.label: Genotypes
inputSpec.help: Use for providing genotypes for conditional analyses

inputSpec.name: pheno_id
inputSpec.help: Column name that contains the sample IDs.  These IDs should match the genotype file IDs and the kinship file IDs.

inputSpec.name: conditional
inputSpec.help: chr pos ref alt format for the SNP that will be added to the model.  Multiple snps in a comma delimited list can be added. (e.g. '22:16425814:C:T' or '22:16425814:C:T,22:17808063:TA:T,22:18096610:G:T')

inputSpec.name: transform
inputSpec.help: rank-normalize residuals and scale, and re-fit null model. Options none or transform

inputSpec.name: transform_rankNorm
inputSpec.help: transform withing het_vars groups or all samples together ( e.g. rankNorm.option in updateNullModOutcome()) options are by.group or all.  Only used in conjuntion with 'transform'

inputSpec.name: transform_rescale
inputSpec.help: rescale residules  ( e.g. rescale.option in updateNullModOutcome() ) options are none, model, residSD.  Only used in conjuntion with 'transform'
